The know-how in Turin is not possible to emigrate, added Vitali, noting FIM had requested a meeting with Sergio Marchionne next week. In contrast to FIM's more conciliatory stance, hardline union FIOM has urged a workforce presence at this weekend's meeting.

John McCain 's reaction to these jibes has been to renew his criticisms of Donald Rumsfeld and to remark: "Thank God he was removed of his duties." significant news by disputing the NFL's assertion that teams can still use the franchise tag to retain stars, even if the collective bargaining agreement expires in March. The NFLPA advised agents of their view. You can franchise anyone you want by whatever date you want, but if there is no CBA, the franchise tag will be meaningless, DeMaurice Smith said. The Eagles expect to use the tag to keep Pro Bowl quarterback Michael Vick , whose contract is due to expire. The NFL has said teams can still use the tag despite the labor uncertainty
